description: Expression matrix for Human NA12878 PacBio CCS RNA sequenceing

software.name: IsoQuant
software.description: IsoQuant is a tool for reference-based analysis of long RNA reads. It assigns reads to known isoforms, detects inconsistencies and construncts novel transcript models.
software.notes: IsoQuant was launched  with the following parameters: min_novel_fsm_supporting_reads = 3, min_novel_supporting_reads = 5, min_reads_supporting_tsts = 3, report_intron_retention = True; minimap2 was launched with the following options -ax splice -Y -k 15 -C5 --junc-bed <annotation BED> --junc-bonus=5
